parameters.name: AccountId
parameters.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud account. You do not need to specify this parameter because this parameter will be removed in the future.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request. You can use the client to generate the value, but you must make sure that it is unique among different requests. The token can contain only ASCII characters and cannot exceed 64 characters in length.

parameters.name: MigrationJobId
parameters.description: The ID of the data migration instance. You can call the **DescribeMigrationJobs** operation to query the instance ID.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the data migration instance resides. For more information, see [List of supported regions](~~141033~~).
